name: EMBER (itch) (War Kiwi Studios)
description:
A WIP prototype game, made in one week for the UDC Jam Week #14. For best graphical results, download the game.

 Made by:

  • Pablo Rosales, "Chuster II" - https://pablorosales.carbonmade.com/
  • Felix Kranz, "Kideya" - https://www.artstation.com/kideya
  • Andrés Hernandez - https://andres83hb.wixsite.com/andresdesign

With the special collaboration of Magdalena Płoszkiewicz (https://www.artstation.com/mugchu)! More coming soon, hopefully!!
